publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4653 Stewart Stevenson: Cullen Skink—That the Parliament welcomes the addition of "Cullen skink" as an entry to the Oxford English Dictionary on 15 June 2006 reflecting as it does a widely recognised, and excellent, expression of Scotland’s fishing and food industries. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-4653 Cullen Skink (lodged on 10 July 2006) Mike Pringle*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Christine Grahame*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Brian Adam*, Mr David Davidson*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-4653 Cullen Skink (lodged on 10 July 2006) Frances Curran*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4653 Cullen Skink (lodged on 10 July 2006) Robin Harper*, Rob Gibson*, Eleanor Scott*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-4653 Cullen Skink (lodged on 10 July 2006) Shiona Baird*
